Tooltips

Tooltips provide additional, contextual information when the user hovers or clicks on an element. Tooltips don’t translate well on touch devices. If mobile users are a primary audience, avoid tooltips.

Example

${require('html-loader?interpolate!../../partials/toggles.html')}

Text Tooltip

This is a link that when hovered over will show a tooltip. This text will show an error tooltip .

Input Tooltip

Guidelines

  • Use a tooltip to provide succinct explanation of an element on the screen. Tooltips should be limited to about 10 words and should not contain any interactive elements.
  • The tooltip should display on mouse enter of an element and hide on mouse leave.
  • Position the tooltip to the top, bottom, right, or left of the corresponding element in a way that avoids obstructing other surrounding elements on the page.
  • Only use tooltips to provide supplemental information. If the content is necessary for the user to perform a primary task, it shouldn’t be in a tooltip.
Tooltip Type Purpose
Black To provide additional help or context to an element.
Red To display when an error occurs or when required fields have not been filled.

Documentation

Bootstrap Documentation

Modifiers

Class Description
.uxf-tooltip-danger add class to tooltip element to apply error tooltip styles
.uxf-tooltip-underline add class to span.tooltip element to apply underline styles

Convert from UXFrame v1 to v2

  1. For Input tooltips, remove the div.tooltip. Instead, add [data-toggle="tooltip"][data-placement="bottom"] [title="This is your tooltip text."] to the input element
  2. For Button tooltips, remove the .tooltip-container surrounding the buttons. Instead, add [data- toggle="tooltip"][data-placement="bottom"][title="This is your tooltip text."] to the button element
  3. For Text tooltips, change span .tooltip-container to span .uxf-tooltip-underline[data-toggle="tooltip"][data- placement="bottom"][title="This is your tooltip text."]
  4. For Error tooltips, add .uxf-tooltip-danger to the element that has the [data-toggle="tooltip"][data- placement="bottom"][title="This is your tooltip text."] attributes.
